body.name: FULife U-Shaped Sectional Sofa with Double Storage Chaises,Pull Out Sleeper Couch Bed,4-Seat Corner Sofá Convertible Modular Lounge Recliner Couches,Upholstery Symmetrical Sofacama Daybed
body.stockDetail: This item will be released on May 17, 2024.
features: ❣️Pull Out Sleeper Sofa Bed❣️Equipped with a spring-assisted lifting mechanism, simply pull out the base under the seat and the hidden seat, and the sofa is quickly to complete the bed transformation.It can meet your various needs and no longer worry about unexpected guests. FULife versatile sofa can be placed in the living room for 4-5 people to watch TV, play games or read; in the office, it can be used as a lunch break to save space for a compact design.

❣️Convertible Sofa Couch❣️Elegant style in carefully-selected linen, ideal for families with children or pets, making it a practical addition to any home. FULife chaise lounge sofa is made of a solid frame and strong legs with the max capacity up to 300Ibs/per seat. The seat is filled with thickened coil spring and foam to ensure good resilience while not sinking easily. The backrest is spacious, so it can provide enough support to make sitting or lounging more comfortable.

❣️Sleeper Sectional Sofa with Chaise Storage❣️2 hidden storage cases below under the sofa chaise, which is best for quilts, blankets, or loose items. The pillows include high-density foam which extends the comfort. And the pillowss are designed with zip-off cover, removable and cleaned easily.

❣️Symmetrical Sofa Couch❣️FULife chaise lounge sofa includes: sofa bed+2 pillows. FULife modular sofa bed can be used as a U shape sofa or a pull-out sleeper bed. It only takes a few seconds to convert from a sofa to a bed, which is very suitable for living room, apartments or any other small places.

❣️U-Shaped Corner Sofa Couch Dimensions❣️Sofa: 113"D x 57.48"W x 27.56"H. FULife sleeper sofa with storage chaises The sofa suits any home decoration, and its touch is soft and has good wear resistance, making it not easy to get outdated after prolonged use. If you often have overnight guests, then this pull out couch may be a good solution.
body.description: 🛋️FULife U-Shaped Sectional Sofa with Double Storage Chaises,Pull Out Sleeper Couch Bed,4-Seat Corner Sofá Convertible Modular Lounge Recliner Couches,Upholstery Symmetrical Sofacama Daybed for Living Room🛋️ 🛋️Product FeaturesThe fabric is high quality ,breathable and durable.Fashionable Appearance:The sofa set with two chaises provides spacious place to lie and relaxSolid Frame: Made up of sturdy wood frame, birch wood legs and sponge, each seat of the sofa’s weight capacity is 300 lbs.This living room requires simple self-assembly, assemble the parts as shown in the included instruction manual🛋️Product Type Sofa & ChaiseDesign SleeperSeating Capacity 4-5Seat Fill Material FoamSeat Construction Coil SpringFrame Material olid + ply WoodLeg Material Plastic legsBack Type Cushion backStorage Included yesStorage Location Under-seat-storageRemovable Cushions yesRemovable Cushion Cover yes🛋️Product DimensionsAssembled Length (in.):113.00Assembled Width (in.):57.48Assembled Height (in.):27.56Weight (lbs.):238.00Package SizeSub-item 1: Package Quantity: 1 57.87 * 28 * 16.14 in. 85 lbs.Sub-item 2: Package Quantity: 1 51.18 * 32.68 * 15.75 in. 85 lbs.Sub-item 3: Package Quantity: 1 57.87 * 28 * 16.14 in. 85 lbs.
